name: Maze 1D
description:
use 'E' or Double click for rotating.

1D Maze - You are in a 3D maze, and you see your 2D screen but you can only move in 1D (left and right direction).

You goal is to find the green wall and touch it like a normal maze puzzle game. You have a 3D maze and you only move in 1D.

When you touch a wall you can't pass through the wall you need to move in a other dimension (up/down) but you have 1D direction only (right/left).

You can use 'rotate' mechanic (its just a 2D rotaion in 3D world), you can 'rotate' and move up/down, rotate again and move right/left.
